channel.title: Mod BD download fail
channel.description:
after getting the 7zip error 2, tryed downloading from ModDB after downloading attempted to open files and 7zip said they were empty despite being over one gig each. when i tryed to open them to look inside window told me the files were invalid
even if noone can help is a mirror that actually works fter down load this is the second ive tryed.

item.title: Mod BD download fail
item.dc:creator: instinx
item.description:
Did you read the instructions?

Once part 1 and 2 have been downloaded rename the files to include this format blackmesa.zip.001 for part one and blackmesa.zip.002 for part 2.
